Song.title: One Still Night
Song.copyright: Words and Music by Neil and Kate DeGraide © 2014 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [||: D Bm F#m | G F#m Bm | D Bm F#m | Em A :||]
VERSE 1: [D]One [F#m]still [Bm]night, [G] Mary aw[F#m]oke [A] Stirred by an a[Em]ngel, she [G]trembled as he [D]spoke [D]One [F#m]small [Bm]child, [G] would soon be b[F#m]orn [A] The King of [Em]kings{,} will [G]wear a crown of [D]thor[A]ns
Chorus: “[G]Glory to [D]God,” the [F#m]angels [Bm]sang [D/A] [G]“Immanu[D]el was born for [A]you this [Bm]day [D/A] [G] Peace on [D]earth, good [F#m]will [F#7/A#]toward [Bm]men [D/A] [G] Immanu[D]el has come to [A]Bethle[Bm]hem [D/A] [G] Immanu[D]el has come to [A]Bethle[D]hem” [(intro)]
Verse 2: [D]One [F#m]still [Bm]night, [G] while Joseph dr[F#m]eamed [G] He saw a v[Em]ision with[G]in his troubled [D]sleep [D]One [F#m]small [Bm]child, [G] his bride would [F#m]give De[G]liverer de[Em]livered, to [G]save us from our [D]sin [G]
Bridge: [A] And to His kingdom there'll [Em]be no end [Bm | G] [A] And to His kingdom there'll [Em]be no end [Bm | G] [A] And to His kingdom there'll [Em]be no end [Bm | Asus A]
VERSE 3: [D]One [F#m]still [Bm]night, [G] a light was sh[F#m]own [A] That all the d[Em]arkness could [G]never overc[D]ome
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 one still night mary awoke stirred by an angel she trembled as he spoke one small child would soon be born the king of kings will wear a crown of thorns chorus glory to god the angels sang immanuel was born for you this day peace on earth good will toward men immanuel has come to bethlehem immanuel has come to bethlehem verse 2 one still night while joseph dreamed he saw a vision within his troubled sleep one small child his bride would give deliverer delivered to save us from our sin bridge and to his kingdom therell be no end and to his kingdom therell be no end and to his kingdom therell be no end verse 3 one still night a light was shown that all the darkness could never overcome
